title: San Diego Spy Games: 1967 - The Saga Begins
description: 1967 marks the first year of Agent Svetlana Ivanovaâ€™s illustrious career in the KGB. Straight out of training, the beautiful Russian spy embarks on her first mission in America. The plan is simple: assimilate into American society, kill Russian traitors, and gather intelligence for the KGB.Episode 1 of this thrilling espionage series follows Agent Ivanova as she travels to the beautiful beaches of San Diego on her first mission. While the mission details are vague, Agent Ivanova knows she must be wary of everyone around her, as traitors are abundant.This is the first installment of the San Diego Spy Games series.
author: Craig Wessel
